Literature.Title: Cyclic colisporifungin and linear cavinafungins, antifungal lipopeptides isolated from Colispora cavincola.
Literature.Author: Ortíz-López FJ, Monteiro MC, González-Menéndez V, Tormo JR, Genilloud O, Bills GF, Vicente F, Zhang C, Roemer T, Singh SB, Reyes F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans MY1055(0-10% Inhibition=8µg/ml),Candida albicans MY1055(MIC=2µg/ml),Candida glabrata ATCC 90030(0-10% Inhibition=8µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 46645(0-10% Inhibition=8µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 46645(MIC=4µg/ml)
